Solar_Panel.name: Solar Panel
Solar_Panel.description: Captures solar energy to power the filtration system.

embodiment.description: Monocrystalline silicon cells for high efficiency.

physics_models.name: Power Generation
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_power(efficiency, irradiance, area):
    return efficiency * irradiance * area
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_power(efficiency, irradiance, area):
    return efficiency * irradiance * area

Solar_Panel.verification_plan: Test under varying irradiance conditions to ensure power output meets requirements.

Filtration_System.name: Filtration System
Filtration_System.description: Removes contaminants from water to produce potable water.

embodiment.description: Includes pre-filter, activated carbon, and UV treatment.

physics_models.name: Flow Rate Calculation
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_flow_rate(area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_flow_rate(area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.coder_notes: Assumes laminar flow and constant viscosity.

Filtration_System.verification_plan: Test filtration efficiency under various contaminant loads.

Smart_Controller.name: Smart Controller
Smart_Controller.description: Monitors and controls the filtration and power systems.

embodiment.description: Includes sensors for water quality and system performance.

physics_models.name: Control Loop
physics_models.equations: Response Time = Processing Speed + Communication Delay
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_response_time(processing_speed, delay):
    return processing_speed + delay
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_response_time(processing_speed, delay):
    return processing_speed + delay

Smart_Controller.verification_plan: Test response time and accuracy of sensor readings.

Battery_Storage.name: Battery Storage
Battery_Storage.description: Stores excess solar energy for operation during low light conditions.

physics_models.name: Battery Capacity
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_capacity(voltage, charge_rate, time):
    return voltage * charge_rate * time
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_capacity(voltage, charge_rate, time):
    return voltage * charge_rate * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Assumes constant voltage and charge rate.

Battery_Storage.verification_plan: Test battery capacity and discharge rate under various loads.

Lightweight_Housing.name: Lightweight Housing
Lightweight_Housing.description: Durable, lightweight enclosure for the system.

embodiment.description: High-density polyethylene for durability and light weight.

physics_models.name: Mass Calculation
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_mass(density, volume):
    return density * volume
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_mass(density, volume):
    return density * volume
